amendment.description: Amendment redirects $1,000,000 to combat the trafficking of endangered species.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 80 printed in Part B of House Report 116-109 to increase and decrease funding by $1,000,000 to combat the trafficking of endangered species.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Jackson Lee amendment (A077) Agreed to by recorded vote: 339 - 79 (Roll no. 326).

action.text: Amendment (A077) offered by Ms. Jackson Lee.
